body: Toothbrushing got a tag, what about Vanilla lol?
why do they censor with hearts?
Lmao, this ravenleaf kid keeps giving his opinion for his taste, then why did u check this kind of shit kid when u hated this kind of tag?

I'm getting old, I can't keep up with all the new slang. I gave up after things like yeet and fleek and stuff. there is a new slang or phrase every month it seems, I'm not gonna pretend I can follow them <_<

Ravenleaf When its willing and both parties consent it was called hotwifing, even though now a days younger couples who arn't married do it.  An example like your talking about would probably be like the chapter in [Senke Kagero] Sweet Life, Please!!

@emil1921 I am aware, that's not the same thing and ticks me off people think so. Believe it or not you can have romantic relationship with someone even if they cuck you and have no desire to leave you/go with the other person. There is a few manga like that, that get the NTR tag, but the relationship is a stable, yet kinky one. No one is being stolen. There is the NTR type that is "willingly sharing your partner", which is close, but that still ends with them usually choosing the new person over their old lover. Hence cuck should get its own tag for when its something all parties want, but the original relationship remains intact
When i saw tooth brushing, i thought of that one anime scene. But this is even better!!
Lol i tought it was a part 2 :'(
toothbrushing is a tag, but we can't get cuckolding as its own tag?
this is stupid & unrealistic. elves don't have tooth decay.
